title: (7830) Vale de Vargo -
description:
What could you get your teeth into in Monte das Louzeiras, near the Spanish border between Seville and Serpa? Wine and olive oil harvested on site from the olive grove with 250 year old trees and a vineyard... Petisco (local snacks)... Sunset drinks... A barbecue? Landscape-wise there is an equally tasty set-up with a 40 hectare olive grove in the Serra Adiça and animals such as sheep, horses, dogs, cats, geese, chickens, peacocks and an ostrich in the yard.

Hosts Ana Luisa, Marc and VIP resident Dunga the ostrich live on the farm. We produce wine in amphorae and oak barrels, but our shop has more than wine: olive oil, piri piri, honey, cosmetic products made from olive oil, vinegar and flavored salts and oils. We are a family business with Swiss and Portuguese roots - and we welcome you with open hearts and arms.

There is a good piece of nature at Monte das Louzeiras. In the patio, surrounded by orange and lemon trees, you can enjoy breakfast, petisco or even a barbecue. We are happy to serve you our wines and other drinks on the terrace with pool, even at sunset.

Relax in the palm park in the shade of palm trees and other trees, read a book in one of the hammocks, or play badminton, volleyball or boules. (the equipment is available).

The park is also perfect for yoga, pilates, tai-chi or meditation. Groups are also welcome.

When it comes to wine tasting and olive oil tasting you have two options: olive oil and wine tasting in our Amphorae-Adega which is one of the "rota do vinho de talha" or on the Alentejo Wine Route. For snacks you have a choice of those served on site or a cafe in the small village of Vale de Vargo, a 35 minute walk away.

Get all the groceries you need at the supermarket 10 minutes' drive away, then head to Serpa, 20 minutes' drive away. This small town offers cultural events and museums and is considered the capital of , a UNESCO-listed traditional Portuguese music genre.

title: (7960) Pedrogão -

OPEN

private house - motorhomes

where you can spend the night safely and in comfort. Our small park has all the services for those traveling by motorhome or caravan, without any cost. Only cleaning services is associated with the cost of 13 €. We are located in a small farm, next to the border with Spain. In a typical Alentejo village - Vila Verde de Ficalho - Serpa. Where you can stroll outdoors and enjoy the true taste of country life.

Visit us

WHERE THE AUTOCARAVANIST IS WELCOME

It's so easy to put in the trash, and those for all outdoor spots, thank you!

The cuisine is very good based on large white bread, goat cheese, tomatoes, asparagus, aromatic herbs from the countryside, good sausages and red meat steaks. The space has no support but is very quiet and clean, since it only serves the ruins. A nearby farm has a pack of dogs that barked all night. Ruïnes closed on Mondays and Tuesday mornings.

description: Luxury area with everything essential and free electricity. A bit lonely, we ate at "La Peña" bar, highly recommended, a very good local dish Revoltillos. visit the Virgen de la Peña. Very friendly people and very good to have a drink in their premises.

title: (7220) - Travessa da Cancela
description: Just see with your own eyes :)to avoid the village first round about on entering village take first right go down to lake turn left on road dirt track keep lake on right for about half a mile turn left and then right  (straight on) up road to next right go down past cemetery and your there it amazing

title: (7220-301) Orjola - 11 Travess Nova
description: Absolutely perfect here??nice water very friendly people around????come and see yourself??

title: (7750) - Unnamed Road
description: Set back from the road ... calm

name: Shamwari Hilltop Retreat - Camping & Campervan Retreat
title: (8970-028) Shamwari Hilltop Retreat - Camping & Campervan Retreat
title_short: (8970-028) Shamwari Hilltop Retreat - Camping & Campervan Retreat
description:
Shamwari Hilltop Retreat is located in the quiet countryside, 10 well-spaced camper pitches (max. Vehicle length 9m), swimming pool terrace, a service area, hot showers, toilets and a barbecue area. A cafe/bar terrace for sundowners and watching the beautiful sunsets. Water and electricity at nominal cost. Shamwari Hilltop Retreat is the perfect retreat to relax. From magnificent nature trails and cycle paths to the Vascao and Guadiana rivers and a breath-taking night sky and only 25mins from the beach.
 "Arrive as a guest and leave as a friend"

title: (7200) Campinho - Unnamed Road
description: Excellent picnic space, good overnight stay with great nights for dark sky, very quiet

title: (7200) Campinho - Unnamed Road
description: Nice spot near the water

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: At the water's edge, super quiet, unpaved parking, near the church at the end of the village.

title: (7750) - 2 Rua do Moinho
description: 2 tables with benches next to the windmill. Museum nucleus. There is also a toilet. Paper bin.

title: (7240) Mourão - R. da Igreja
description: Museum car park next to church and cemetery.

title: (7750) Castro Verde - Rua de São Miguel
title_short: (7750) Castro Verde - Rua de São Miguel
description: Idyllic picnic area with tables, benches and 2 grills. A trash can available. Now a lot of water in the river in February.

title: (7240) Aldeia Da Luz - 1 Terreiro do Rossio
title_short: (7240) Aldeia Da Luz - 1 Terreiro do Rossio
description: Interesting stage in Luz village (new village built because original became sinked with Alqueva dam) to see Monsaraz, Mourão and Moura. Located near the Luz Museum. Calm

title: (7240-100) Évora - Rua H
description: Picnic area with some barbecue structure. Bin. Water source (dont know if its good to drink). Starting point of hiking route.

title: (8970) Alcoutim e Pereiro - Unnamed Road
description: Menhires de Lovajo, parking lot at the menhirs of Lovajo. Level gravel place. Very quiet location if you are not afraid of a few scratches as the last kilometer leads over a gravel road that is quite narrow. But feasible with 6m CC.

title: (7220) Monte do Trigo - Unnamed Road
description: Parking near the dam, several possible locations, pebbles or grassy depending on the season. No service

title: (8970) Giões - M507
description: Natural source of water

title: (7200) Campinho - Unnamed Road
description: Calm place does not give me nature! Caminho for 4x4. Com view for Monsaraz.

title: (8970) Alcoutim -
description: Beautiful view and peaceful! A bit rugged road to get here and mostly suitable for van or smaller RV. Nice walks and villige nearby. Toilet in car is necessary, hard groud so not possible to make a pit for your waste… Keep cleen!

title: (8970) Alcoutim - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking area on the road leading to Castelo Velho. It is located right under the castle,  opposite to the rivers Alcoutim and Sanlúcar de Guadiana.

title: (8970) - EM507
description: Location in the countryside, overlooking the Rio Guandiana Valley separating Portugal and Spain. Beautiful sunset, it is 30 degrees on Oct. 6 ..... No services of course! Do not leave your toilet paper on the ground and bury your needs from the ground (shovel) thank you for the following ...

title: (7240) Mourão - Unnamed Road
description: Parking spot! Motorhomes are tolerated, GNR often drives past and just says hello. It's a little windy up there. But closest to the beach!

title: () Mourão - Rua de São José
description: Tar pitch, mostly flat, but other pitches all around possible. Super quiet, now and then an angler.

title: (7240) Mourão - Unnamed Road
description:
No official camper place, just a parking lot for campers as well as for cars, next to the Alqueva reservoir. A few minutes walk you have a picnic area at the other parking lot. It's very uneven. You need wedges. There is no water and no disposal. Please keep nature clean!
A little further down the path there is the next parking lot, one on top of the island, one below, there you are close to the toilets and so on! WC closed from November!

title: (8970) - 13 Rua de Giões
description: Small pearl of parking in the village of Gioes, opposite the snack / bar / pastry "O Poço Novo". The place is calm, pleasant with chickens and cocks pecking freely. Very welcome villagers. Hiking PR5. No maintenance service but wifi access at the bar with code 7D4C33AB23. The bar prices are very very affordable and the owner particularly friendly.

title: (8970-064) Alcoutim - 4 Rua de Timor
description: Beautiful place overlooking Alcoutim with free amenities. The cp place is also completely free to stand there.

title: (8970-064) Alcoutim - 25 Avenida de Espanha
description: Praia Fluvial: small beach with bar / snack, wc, free outdoor showers, garbage cans, beach volleyball, shaded parking height 2.20 m. Peaceful place to spend the day and night, the baker even goes in the morning ...

title: (8970) Alcoutim - 25 Avenida de Espanha
description: Parking 400 m from the center. The entrance is narrow but it goes anyway. It is better to ensure that there is room before entering to avoid having to maneuver to go out. No service but you can use the free terminal of the area a little further. Very quiet at night. Wifi, in and around the library. Supermarket in the street behind the tourist office.

title: (8970) Alcoutim - N122-1
description: Parking day and night near swimming Fluvial. Quiet by river. Services at top of hill 700m.

title: (8970-063) Alcoutim - 2 Rua da Escola Primaria
description: Quiet place to stop for the night, only for 4 or 5 vans but near the center of the town. Near the church and the castle. 100 meters from the center.

title: (21595) Sanlúcar de Guadiana - HU-4401
description: Sanlucar area of Guadiana. Border with Portugal, beautiful city. To go to Portugal, you have to take boats and go to the village of Alcoutim. Zipline that you pass from one city to another, with river beach with bar to eat well and cheap

title: (8970) Alcoutim - 9 EM507
description: New Free ( until now) Motorhome Area /  parking very close to the castle and the port to cross to Spain by boat. The construction of a camper van area. Currently they are in the 3rd phase of the investment. The area will come into service in 2022...but still not ready april 2023...overall its still good for a stay there & when finished it will be one of the best for services

title: (7200) Corval -
description: Easily accessible place. Quiet and inviting for a lakeside hike. No driving ban for dirty and if everyone takes something more, the place will soon be clean. Thanks!

title: () Reguengos de Monsaraz - 10 Rua Tomás Ribeiro
title_short: () Reguengos de Monsaraz - 10 Rua Tomás Ribeiro
description: Parking of + - 300 spaces for day and night without any convenience. Good for sleeping and parking!

title: (7200-393) Reguengos de Monsaraz - 33 Campo 25 de Abril
title_short: (7200-393) Reguengos de Monsaraz - 33 Campo 25 de Abril
description: Small municipal and free parking area with free loading and unloading services. Right next to the fire station that very kindly provide, when needed and via an extension cable dropped from the window, electricity for those who need to recharge the batteries. I changed the description by removing the presence of the electricity service because the area does not have it and therefore it is not a right, but a kindness of the firefighters that can be reciprocated with a cash donation.

title: (7200) Reguengos de Monsaraz - 53 N255
description: Free day parking. Right next to the bus station. Too close to the road and too noisy to spend the night but very convenient and close to the center to visit the city on foot. Without services. We just spent the day.

title: (7200) Reguengos de Monsaraz - 41 Rua Doutor António Gião
title_short: (7200) Reguengos de Monsaraz - 41 Rua Doutor António Gião
description: Laundry inside of Public Market

title: (7200) Reguengos de Monsaraz - Via do Grande Lago
title_short: (7200) Reguengos de Monsaraz - Via do Grande Lago
description: Parque do Lidl with washing machine clothes.

title: (7200) Reguengos de Monsaraz - 2 Rua da Horta da Santinha
title_short: (7200) Reguengos de Monsaraz - 2 Rua da Horta da Santinha
description: Basic parking spot st the continente grocery store.  They painted the spots bright blue with a camper on the spot, there are signs posted Autocaravan only.

title: (7200) Reguengos de Monsaraz - 3 Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
title_short: (7200) Reguengos de Monsaraz - 3 Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
description: Parking near the municipal swimming pool.

title: (8970-305) Pereiro - N124
description: Parking free for camper van, could spend night, buy jeton at coffee bar at Pereiro

title: (7200) Herdadinha - CM1099
description: Place nearby a beautiful church, with a good parking to stay at night. It doesn't have any services but it's a really special place to stay for one or two nights. It's a really good reaction to visit some wineries with one of the best in the region really close.
